links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power

wikitext.*:
[[File:Wayne Che Yip.jpg|thumb|200px|''Wayne Che Yip'' in 2021]]
'''Wayne Che Yip''' (born [[1981]]) is a British  director. He directed four episodes of the first season of the''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power‎]]'', in addition of serving as executive producer.<ref>{{webcite|author=Cynthia Littleton |articleurl=https://variety.com/2021/tv/news/lord-of-the-rings-amazon-wayne-che-yip-1234936829/|articlename=
‘Lord of the Rings’ Series Adds Director Wayne Che Yip as Co-Executive Producer
|dated=24 March 2021|website=Variety|accessed=21 August 2021}}</ref>
